fees.waiverText: Annual fee waived on ₹10 Lakh annual spend. Multiple joining fee options available (₹75K with vouchers, ₹15K without, or LTF for select customers)

rewards.name: Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 1.5 RP per ₹100 spent on all categories. 0.7 RP per ₹100 on utilities, insurance, govt, education
rewards.joiningBonus: Welcome vouchers from Oberoi Hotels, Postcard Hotel, Vouchagram, or Luxe Gift Card worth joining fee value
rewards.exclusions: Fuel (no RP), Rent capped at 500 RP/cycle, Reduced rate on Utility, Insurance, Govt, Education

calculator.specialLogic: No pre-set spending limit (NPSL). Max 10,000 RP cash redemption per month

redemption.bestOption: Redeem against cash credit at 1 RP = ₹1

lounge.international: 4 per quarter (Priority Pass). Unlimited outside India

golf.text: Unlimited complimentary golf games and lessons at select premium clubs across India

movies.text: BOGO on BookMyShow (3x/month, max ₹700 per free ticket + ₹50 off F&B)

dining.text: ₹3,000 off on dining at 100+ restaurants via EazyDiner, twice a year

concierge.text: 24x7 concierge services for travel, dining, entertainment bookings

insurance.text: Air Accident Cover up to ₹2.5 Crore, Total Protect for fraud protection

metadata.bestFor: HNIs seeking luxury lifestyle benefits with 22K gold inlay card and unlimited international lounge access
metadata.verdict: Premium lifestyle card with iconic design and strong lounge benefits, but reward rate is low for the segment
pros: 22K gold inlay - unique design statement
1 RP = ₹1 cash redemption value
Unlimited international lounge access outside India
No pre-set spending limit (NPSL)
Low forex markup of 1.8%
Unlimited golf access
cons: Very high joining fee (₹75,000 standard)
Low reward rate of 1.5% vs competitors at 3-5%
No milestone benefits for high spenders
Domestic lounge visits with Priority Pass charged ($27)
Income eligibility of ₹36L+ is restrictive

fees.waiverText: Lifetime free from 2nd year. Joining fee offset by welcome vouchers worth ₹15,000

rewards.name: Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 2.5 RP per ₹100 on online spends, 1.5 RP on travel/airlines, 1 RP on offline, 0.7 RP on utilities
rewards.joiningBonus: Choice of: Oberoi Hotel stay voucher, Postcard Hotel voucher, Montblanc voucher, Luxe Gift Card ₹5,000, or brand vouchers (Bata, Pantaloons, etc.)
rewards.exclusions: Fuel (no RP), Rent capped at 500 RP/cycle, Reduced rate on Utility, Insurance, Govt, Education

calculator.specialLogic: Max 7,500 RP cash redemption per month. Golf requires ₹25,000 spend in previous month

redemption.bestOption: Cash credit at 1 RP = ₹0.75, making effective value-back ~1.87% on online spends

golf.text: 1 complimentary golf game + 1 lesson per month (requires ₹25,000 spend in previous month)

movies.text: BOGO on BookMyShow (3x/month, max ₹200 per free ticket)

insurance.text: Air Accident Cover ₹25 Lakh, Total Protect, Auto Assist, Travel Insurance

exclusiveAccount.text: Complimentary IndusInd Exclusive Savings Account with zero AMB

metadata.bestFor: Online shoppers seeking 2.5% value-back on e-commerce with no annual fee and premium lifestyle benefits
metadata.verdict: Solid premium card for online shoppers with good cashback redemption and lifetime free structure
pros: Lifetime free from 2nd year (no annual fee)
2.5 RP on online spends = ~1.87% effective cashback
Welcome vouchers worth the joining fee
Complimentary zero-AMB IndusInd Exclusive Account
Golf benefits included
Good lounge access for both domestic and international
cons: High forex markup of 3.5%
Only 1 lounge visit per quarter (domestic & international each)
7,500 RP monthly cap on cash redemption
Golf benefit requires ₹25K spend in previous month
Low 0.7% on utilities reduces overall value

fees.waiverText: Lifetime Free (LTF). Paid variants available at ₹5,000-₹9,999 with welcome vouchers

rewards.name: Reward Points
rewards.earningText: 1 RP per ₹100 on weekdays, 2 RP per ₹100 on weekends. 0.7 RP on utilities, medical, auto, telecom
rewards.joiningBonus: Welcome vouchers from top brands (only on paid variants). 3,000 bonus RP on ₹5 Lakh annual spend milestone
rewards.exclusions: Fuel (no RP), Rent/Wallet/Utility/Insurance not counted for milestone

calculator.specialLogic: Weekend vs weekday earning structure. Max 5,000 RP cash redemption per month. Milestone: 3,000 bonus RP on ₹5L annual spend

milestones.benefit: 3,000 bonus Reward Points on ₹5 Lakh annual spend

movies.text: BOGO on BookMyShow (1x/month, max ₹200 per free ticket + ₹50 off F&B)

forex.text: 1.8% + GST (one of the lowest in market)

insurance.text: Air Accident Cover ₹25 Lakh, Total Protect, Auto Assist, Lost Baggage ₹1L, Lost Ticket ₹25K

metadata.bestFor: First-time credit card users seeking LTF card with low forex markup and basic travel insurance benefits
metadata.verdict: Decent LTF option with low forex and insurance, but devalued rewards and removed lounge access hurt its appeal
pros: Lifetime free - no joining or annual fee
Low forex markup of 1.8% (excellent for international use)
Comprehensive travel insurance coverage
2x rewards on weekends incentivizes planned spending
No cash advance fee (rare benefit)
Milestone bonus of 3,000 RP on ₹5L spend
cons: Lounge access DISCONTINUED from March 2025
Low reward rate (0.5-1% effective value)
Cash redemption devalued to 1 RP = ₹0.50
Only 1 BOGO movie per month
No dining or golf benefits
5,000 RP monthly cap on cash redemption

name: Club Vistara IndusInd Bank Explorer Credit Card

fees.waiverText: No waiver. Note: Program being revised due to Vistara-Air India merger (eff. Nov 2024)

rewards.name: Club Vistara Points
rewards.earningText: 8 CV Points per ₹200 on Vistara website, 6 CV on travel/airlines/hotels, 2 CV elsewhere, 1 CV on utilities/fuel/insurance
rewards.expiry: As per Club Vistara program rules
rewards.joiningBonus: Complimentary CV Gold membership (1st year), Business Class ticket voucher (base fare waiver), Gift vouchers worth ₹25,000 (Luxe/Oberoi/Postcard)
rewards.exclusions: Reduced CV Points on utilities, fuel, insurance categories

calculator.specialLogic: CV Points earned only up to assigned credit limit per cycle. Business class voucher on ₹3L spend milestone (max 5 per year)

redemption.bestOption: Redeem CV Points for Vistara/Air India flights. Business class voucher on ₹3L spend

options.desc: CV Points for award flights on Vistara network

movies.text: BOGO on BookMyShow (2x/month, max ₹700 per free ticket)

dining.text: ₹3,000 off dining at EazyDiner partner restaurants twice a year

insurance.text: Air Accident Cover ₹2.5 Crore, Total Protect, Travel Insurance

specialFeatures.vistaraGold: Complimentary CV Gold membership (1st year): Priority check-in, boarding, baggage

metadata.bestFor: Frequent Vistara flyers seeking premium travel benefits and business class vouchers through milestone spends
metadata.verdict: Strong for Vistara loyalists with excellent milestone benefits, but high fees and program uncertainty due to merger
pros: Business Class vouchers on milestone spends (up to 5/year)
Complimentary CV Gold membership benefits
8 CV Points on Vistara bookings (4% effective)
No late payment, over-limit, or cash advance fees
Good international lounge access (4/quarter)
Welcome vouchers worth ₹25,000
cons: Very high joining fee of ₹40,000 + GST
Annual fee of ₹10,000 with no waiver
Program being revised due to Vistara-Air India merger
Low CV Points on non-travel categories
Only 1 domestic lounge visit per quarter
CV Gold membership only for 1st year

name: EazyDiner IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

rewards.name: Reward Points + EazyPoints
rewards.earningText: 2 RP per ₹100 spent (except fuel, insurance, rent, utility, govt). 0.7 RP on excluded categories. 2X EazyPoints on EazyDiner transactions
rewards.expiry: 1 year for EazyPoints, RP never expire
rewards.joiningBonus: 3-month EazyDiner Prime membership worth ₹1,095, 500 bonus EazyPoints
rewards.exclusions: Fuel, Insurance, Rent, Utility, Government - earn only 0.7 RP/₹100

calculator.specialLogic: Prime membership renewed for 3 months on ₹30,000 quarterly spend. 2,000 bonus RP on ₹30K spend every 90 days

redemption.bestOption: Redeem RP instantly against restaurant bills via PayEazy on EazyDiner app

options.desc: Free hotel stays, meals, exclusive events

milestones.benefit: 3-month EazyDiner Prime renewal + 2,000 Bonus RP (every 90 days)

dining.text: 25% off on dining via EazyDiner Prime at 2,000+ restaurants. Additional 20% off (up to ₹500) when paying via PayEazy on EazyDiner app
dining.prime: 3-month EazyDiner Prime membership included (renewed on ₹30K quarterly spend)
dining.discount: Up to 45% total discount on dining

metadata.bestFor: Foodies who frequently dine out and want lifetime free card with guaranteed 25-45% dining discounts
metadata.verdict: Excellent lifetime free dining card with substantial restaurant discounts via EazyDiner ecosystem
pros: Lifetime free - no joining or annual fee
25% base + 20% extra = up to 45% off on dining via PayEazy
Complimentary EazyDiner Prime membership
2X EazyPoints on all EazyDiner transactions
Milestone benefits with 2,000 bonus RP on ₹30K spend
Prime membership auto-renews on maintaining spend
cons: No lounge access
No movie benefits
Low redemption value of RP (₹0.10 per point)
High forex markup of 3.5%
Dining discount only via EazyDiner app PayEazy
Not useful for non-diners

name: IndusInd Platinum Aura Edge Credit Card

fees.waiverText: Lifetime Free. Some variants have ₹500 joining fee

rewards.name: Savings Points (Reward Points)
rewards.earningText: Choose from 4 reward plans (Shop/Home/Travel/Party). Up to 4 SP per ₹100 on select categories, 0.5 SP on others
rewards.joiningBonus: Welcome discount vouchers from Amazon, Flipkart, Big Bazaar, Zee5, Apollo Pharmacy, Bata, Vero Moda, etc.
rewards.exclusions: Fuel (no RP). Plan categories outside chosen plan earn base 0.5 SP rate

calculator.specialLogic: Choose 1 of 4 plans (Shop/Home/Travel/Party). Can change plan after 6 months. Max 2,500 SP cash redemption per month

redemption.bestOption: Cash credit at 1 SP = ₹0.40 or non-cash at 1 SP = ₹0.50

insurance.text: Air Accident Cover ₹25 Lakh, Total Protect, Travel Insurance (delayed/lost baggage, passport, ticket)

contactless.text: Tap and pay for transactions up to ₹5,000

metadata.bestFor: First-time credit card users seeking LTF card with customizable reward plans based on spending habits
metadata.verdict: Basic entry-level LTF card with unique customizable reward plans but limited travel/lifestyle benefits
pros: Lifetime free - no joining or annual fee
Unique 4-plan reward structure for customization
Up to 4 SP/₹100 on chosen plan categories (~1.6% value)
Welcome vouchers from popular brands
Travel insurance included
Contactless payments supported
cons: No lounge access
No movie or golf benefits
Low base rate of 0.5 SP on non-plan categories
Cash redemption value only ₹0.40 per point
High forex markup of 3.5%
2,500 SP monthly cap on cash redemption
Can only change reward plan after 6 months
